name: UPto75
tag_list: coupons, discount-coupons, restaurant-discounts, sales, deals, offers, free-coupons
overview:
UPto75.com is an online marketing site that compiles all retail sales, offers, and bargains that are active in 7 major Indian cities - Mumbai, Delhi, Kolkata, Chennai, Hyderabad, Pune and Bangalore. It covers a wide range of products in over 30 product categories including restaurants, hotels, travel, and all popular shopping categories like clothes, footwear, books, computers, electronics, furniture, automobiles, education, food, gifts, health, beauty, Jewellery, leisure, games, toys, sports & fitness, music & movies etc.

Though it competes with other online marketing sites that fulfil a similar need, UPto75.com differentiates itself through superior technology, product flexibility and marketing strength. The management team recognises that shoppersâ€™ needs are paramount and strives to get exclusive discount coupons from the retailers and restaurants. The site has been built to make it an easy, convenient and profitable experience for them.

Retailers and Restaurant owners benefit from increased sales, footfalls and more importantly branding at minimal costs. The registration fee on the site is almost negligible, a fraction of advertising costs in other media. Business realized from one customer covers the entire cost of advertising on the site.
